title: Available 2 Bed 3 Bath
posting_body: This apartment has hardwood flooring in the kitchen, dining room, and the living room.
This unit has tile flooring in the bathroom(s) and wall-to-wall carpeting in the bedroom(s).
the kitchen has double sinks, granite counters, and all stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher.
There is central A/C and heat, patio/balcony, and an in-unit washer/dryer.
Unit amenities include ceiling fans, garden tub, breakfast bar, pantry, and tile backsplash.

Community amenities include 24-hour emergency maintenance, four rooftop decks, business center, courtyard, elevator, outdoor fire pit, package pickup, bike storage, fitness center, on-site storage, outdoor kitchen, and a swimming pool.
Parking options in the community covered garage are available.
Located only a twelve minute drive to Interstate-35.
PHOTOS ARE AN EXAMPLE OF SIMILAR UNITS WITHIN THE BUILDING, ACTUAL UNIT MAY VARY.
***Availability and pricing is real-time, can change daily, and varies by lease term***
